name: Cooking Chef
description:
Welcome to your cooking world! Cooking Town featured with time-management and food-cooking RPG gameplay. 🍭😀

Cook food of different flavors with professional machines. Acid, bitter, sweet, or spicy. Cook hamburger🍔, seafood🐟, spaghetti🍝, steak. Make cola, juice🍹 or milk tea☕️ . Make sweet ice cream cone, cupcake. Run Western Restaurant, Indie Restaurant, Chinese Restaurant and so on🏪. You are not only a chef who decides the taste, but also the master who owns restaurants! Experience and serve exotic flavors all over the world with Top cooking chef. Practice makes a skilled chef.

Sweet Note: upgrade your kitchen appliances and interior to attract more customers. 🎂

Features:
☆ 12+ custom-designed restaurants
☆ 480+ levels for you to challenge
☆ Hundreds of dishes and ingredients
☆ Beautify your kitchen with elegant decorations
☆ Generous coin and gem rewards for achievement challenges

Serve best cuisine, earn yourself a big fortune. Take this cooking adventure, become a top chef in the world! Enjoy cooking and running kitchens on your own!
